column5: This is why I really like this board and the members here.  This morning I,m at work wishing I was fishing and get a text.  Hey Brian (not guy, not dude,not bud, not sir) this is how you catch lakers on lake Joe. Live bait.  I LMAO at this text.  Once work was done for the day,I head out to fish a couple of hours. As Im sitting there ,I see a couple of guys walking out. One guy looks like someone from the board. I give a shout out. They keep walking. I walk over and sure enough,it,s who I thought it was. Talking away with him and enjoying our talk,I tell him our friend from the board is stopping by next week to pick up my smitty.  Turns out the guy, that is picking it up, is the guy with him.  He laughs as I had never met this guy before.  These two guys were, Christopher K and Jeremy.  What a couple of  weisenheimer guys.  Good seeing ya byes, and nice to have met you Jer.
Nice to hear you guys hooked up
Be careful Roy. I was told by someone 40 years younger than I am that "hooking up" with other GUYS or Dudes has an entirely different meaning than I thought it did.
That's not Roy. That's Lew. Lew only hooks up with "Ladies" and only over 50 inches.
yooose guys are a real bunch a' jokers.
I apologize Lew, Roy was on my mind since he corrected me recently in a PM.
That a boy Lew.  Get all the hogs.   Brian how did you guys make out.
Glad to hear that you didn't refer to the two GUYS as.....two YOUNG LADS !
Be careful Roy. I was told by someone 40 years younger than I am that "hooking up" with other GUYS or Dudes has an entirely different meaning than I thought it did.
Dead sticking > jipping on Lake Joe.

Dead sticking > jipping on Lake Joe.   jipping? New lingo for what? LOL  I was wanting to head up there next weekend,but hearing lots of slush happening the last couple of days, and weather coming is not looking like it will help. Oh well,there,s always the open water season.
Brian how did you guys make out.  That's getting a bit too personal, don't you think??
